  • Constructor Details

    • Epidemic

      public Epidemic()
      Constructs a new instance of the Epidemic card, which is an extension of the AdventureCard. This constructor initializes the card's name by setting it to the class's simple name. The Epidemic card represents an in-game scenario where infected crew members need to be removed from a player's ship as part of the game's mechanics.

  • Method Details

    • getFirstState

      public CardState getFirstState()
      Retrieves the first state from the list of card states associated with the card.
      Specified by:
      getFirstState in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      the first CardState in the list of predefined states for the card

    • play

      public void play(PlayerChoicesDataStructure playerChoices) throws UnknownStateException
      Executes the play logic for the Epidemic card based on the current card state. Performs specific actions such as removing infected crew members during the epidemic phase and transitions to subsequent game states as required.
      Specified by:
      play in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      playerChoices - represents the choices made by the current player during this phase. It provides the data required for processing the card's logic.
      Throws:
      UnknownStateException - if the current card state is unrecognized or unsupported.

    • toClientCard

      public ClientCard toClientCard()
      Converts the current Epidemic instance to its corresponding client-side representation, encapsulated within a ClientEpidemic object. Common properties are copied from the server object to the client object during this conversion.
      Specified by:
      toClientCard in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      A ClientEpidemic object representing the current Epidemic instance.
